intro: Symphyostemon nigricans, commonly known as the blackstem symphyostemon, is a tropical shrub native to Central America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its dark, woody stems and opposite, lance-shaped leaves. It produces small, white to pale yellow flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. The fruit is a small, fleshy capsule that contains several seeds.
